name: Lawn Off
description:
Fred is a perfectionist. He takes pride in his lawn being trimmed to perfection and is not afraid to throw it in your face! 

Compete against him to show him which lawn is the best by keeping your lawn trimmed down, growing the oh-so-pretty flowers and disposing of the trash that mean seagulls constantly leave behind.

Team Team's submission to the United Game Jam explores a game based on the theme "Two", achieved through the competition of two neighbours fighting for the title of best lawn owner.

Flippy - Design & Programming
Fabian - Design & 3D Art
Chiara - Design & UI

Music used:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=deEaqnsvc7U
